Request Military Assistance

Ask your allies to support you in the war.
The chance of agreement is based on your reputation and that between the other two parties.
If the other two are also allied, there's a chance one alliance will break.
-3 [AssetData(19596) Text] per request.

Click on an enemy object whom [AssetData([NotificationContext CharacterGUID]) Text] should assist.
-3 [AssetData(19596) Text]

-3 [AssetData(19596) Text]

[Participants ParticipantName(0)]

[Participants ParticipantName(3)]
Select the desired diplomatic interaction:

Grants/revokes access to island storage and unit control. Current: [AssetForValue(1500005362, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount([AssetForValue(1500005359, [AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid]) Guid] )]) Text]

Grants or revokes [Participants ParticipantName([AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid])] access to your island goods/items and command of your units.
The party can manually load any goods/items from your islands onto ships or unload them onto your islands.
They can view your full island storage and also set your island purchasing behavior.
With [ShortcutManager ShortcutTooltip(CommandAllyMove)] (=Move) and [ShortcutManager ShortcutTooltip(CommandAllyAttack)] (=Attack), they can command your units.
Command allied ships

Add the selected object from [Participants ParticipantName([AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid])] to the group for this session and party or select the group.
Use [ShortcutManager ShortcutTooltip(CommandAllyMove)] (=Move) and [ShortcutManager ShortcutTooltip(CommandAllyAttack)] (=Attack) to give commands to the selected object (Left Click).
<font overrideTextColor="true" color='#edc891'>[AssetData(1500001297) Text]</font>

Add selection to the group for this session and party,
or delete the group if nothing is selected.

You have no alliance with this party
OR no permission (human players only)
Sabotage Ceasefire

Pay [Participants ParticipantName([AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid])] so that they send no spies into your cities (Lasts 1 hour).
The agreement becomes void immediately if one of your spies is discovered by the party.
(Spies can also be discovered by parties they are not actively deployed against!)
Time remaining: [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount([AssetForValue(1500004036, [AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid]) Guid])] minute(s).
<font overrideTextColor="true" color='#edc891'>[AssetData(1500005330) Text]</font>

Pay the required amount for a spy/sabotage ceasefire.
The agreement becomes void immediately if one of your spies is discovered by the party.
(Spies can also be discovered by parties they are not actively deployed against!)

Sabotage ceasefire with [Participants ParticipantName([AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid])] is active.
Time remaining: [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount([AssetForValue(1500004036, [AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid]) Guid])] minute(s).
Request Support Fleet

What kind of support fleet would you like to request?
Your reputation directly influences the chance of success, or 80% with neutral parties.
Only if the request is successful you pay reputation.

What kind of support fleet would you like to request?
Your reputation directly influences the chance of success, or 80% with neutral parties.
You only pay reputation if the request is successful.

Wait for the support fleet to be completed ... [Conditions QuestCondition TimeLimit >> time]
And protect the mission ship.

Wait until the support fleet has fully arrived.
Small Support Fleet: -5 [AssetData(19596) Text].
Large Support Fleet: -10 [AssetData(19596) Text]
If the mission ship is destroyed, the quest can only be canceled manually (unfortunately, it won't cancel automatically)
Click the mission ship to accept the support fleet and complete the quest.
Small Support Fleet (4 Ships)

[AssetData(4040) Text].
Requires: [AssetData(14330) Text].
-5 [AssetData(19596) Text] for 4 warships and 4 items.
Players can only deliver ship types they have already built.
Success chance: [Participants ParticipantReputationTo([AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid],[Participants GetCurrentParticipantID])] % (or 80% with neutral parties)
Cooldown: 10/30 minutes
(Starts in the session of the Coop Leader, and AI must own an island in that session)
Protect the mission ship! If it's destroyed, the fleet can no longer be accepted (this way, your enemy can prevent you from receiving the fleet).
Large Support Fleet (8 Ships)

[AssetData(4040) Text].
Requires: [AssetData(14323) Text].
-10 [AssetData(19596) Text] for 8 warships and 8 items.
Players can only deliver ship types they have already built.
Success chance: [Participants ParticipantReputationTo([AssetForValue(1500005361, [Economy MetaStorage StorageAmount(1500005349)]) Guid],[Participants GetCurrentParticipantID])] % (or 80% with neutral parties)
Cooldown: 10/30 minutes
(Starts in the session of the Coop leader)
Protect the mission ship! If it's destroyed, the fleet can no longer be accepted (this way, your enemy can prevent you from receiving the fleet).
